title: News24.com | 'I don't want to die on the street' - homeless people eager to be taken to shelters during lockdown
description: Homeless people roaming the streets of Lenasia in Johannesburg are eager to co-operate with President Cyril Ramaphosa in preventing the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
Homeless people roaming the streets of Lenasia in Johannesburg are eager to co-operate with President Cyril Ramaphosa in preventing the spread of the coronavirus.
Ramaphosa declared a lockdown of the entire nation on Monday evening.
